title: Blogz
description: Blogz is a dynamic MERN stack social network application. Node and Express.js manage routes for user actions like post creation, likes, and deletion. Test Blogz with username & password as 'demo'.

title: ReactNews
description: This is a Next.js TypeScript app styled with Sass and powered by the GNews API. It features a curation of the latest news articles on a variety of subjects sourced from over 50,000 news vendors around the world.

title: Explore Movies
description: This React & Express.js web application was written in JavaScript and utilises MaterialUI (MUI) with custom styled components, featuring movies sourced via the TMDb API with save to favourites functionality.

title: Expenses Chart
description: This Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind app dynamically presents JSON chart data utilising Chart.js. Bars represent the amount of spending per day. The current day, as per the user's locale, is highlighted with a different coloured bar.

title: News Homepage
description: This Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind app includes a stunning and well laid out news homepage split into appropriate functional components. It offers interactive UI, seamless navigation, and looks superb across all devices.

title: Results Summary
description: A Results Summary Component for a psychometric test built with Vanilla JavaScript and Sass, with no external libraries or frameworks involved. There is artistic use of CSS gradients and flexbox achieves a beautifully responsive layout.

title: The Dog Store
description: 200+ product WooCommerce store and large knowledgebase, owned by the UK's top dog behaviourist, Stan Rawlinson. Originally migrated from a 10-year-old failing Drupal store to WordPress and WooCommerce.

title: Pinewoods Property
description: Job board and business website for 40+ year old recruitment and property solutions business, Pinewoods. This was implemented via open source WordPress and configured on a secure, optimised, Ubuntu VPS hosting environment.
